title: Impressions of Theophrastus Such - least contented

content.question: According to the narrator, when is Touchwood LEAST contented?

choices.label: When he fails to agree with an opponent
When he fails to get a peaceful nightâ€™s sleep
When he lacks a specific object to challenge
When he is unable to achieve a benevolent end

content.answer: When he lacks a specific object to challenge

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how a character's own choices, actions, and speech reveal complexities in that character, and explain the function of those complexities.
